meanings.definition: A person who makes concessions in order to reach a mutual agreement.
meanings.sent1: The compromisers in the group helped everyone find a solution.
meanings.sent2: The team of compromisers worked together to find a middle ground.
meanings.sent3: The compromisers at the negotiation table made sure everyone left happy.
meanings.sent4: In the game of compromise, the compromisers are the true champions.
meanings.sent5: The image of the compromisers shaking hands stayed in everyone's mind.

meanings.definition: Those who settle differences by mutual concessions.
meanings.sent1: We need compromisers to help us resolve our disagreements peacefully.
meanings.sent2: The compromisers in the community always find a way to make things work.
meanings.sent3: The compromisers at the party made sure everyone got a piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: Like skilled diplomats, compromisers navigate tricky situations with ease.
meanings.sent5: The compromisers' ability to find common ground is truly admirable.
